text: You Nazty Spy! is the 44th short movie by The Three Stooges. It was the first Hollywood movie to make fun of Adolf Hitler. In the movie, Germany is replaced by the pretend country of Moronica and the Hitler-type character is called Moe Hailstone, and is played by Stooge Moe Howard. This made Howard the first US actor to play Hitler. It was directed by Jules White. == Other websites == * Category:American comedy movies Category:1940 movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about Adolf Hitler
title: You Nazty Spy!
